languages.text: {n}Мейв, кажется, справляется с одолевающими ее чувствами, и бросает на вас робкий взгляд в ожидании вердикта.{/n}
{n}Maive seems to have reined in the emotions that were overtaking her, and she casts a timid glance at you as she awaits the verdict.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мейв, кажется, справляется с одолевающими ее чувствами, и бросает на вас робкий взгляд в ожидании вердикта.{/n}

{n}Maive seems to have reined in the emotions that were overtaking her, and she casts a timid glance at you as she awaits the verdict.{/n}

languages.text: {n}梅芙似乎已经克制住了心中的情绪。她一边等待着你的宣判，一边胆怯地瞥了你一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive seems to have reined in the emotions that were overtaking her, and she casts a timid glance at you as she awaits the verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙似乎已经克制住了心中的情绪。她一边等待着你的宣判，一边胆怯地瞥了你一眼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive parece haber dominado las emociones que la abrumaban, y arriesga una tímida mirada de soslayo en tu dirección mientras espera que dictes sentencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive seems to have reined in the emotions that were overtaking her, and she casts a timid glance at you as she awaits the verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive parece haber dominado las emociones que la abrumaban, y arriesga una tímida mirada de soslayo en tu dirección mientras espera que dictes sentencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive, onu ele geçiren duyguları dizginlemiş gibi görünüyor. Hükmünü duymayı beklerken sana çekingen bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive seems to have reined in the emotions that were overtaking her, and she casts a timid glance at you as she awaits the verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive, onu ele geçiren duyguları dizginlemiş gibi görünüyor. Hükmünü duymayı beklerken sana çekingen bir bakış atıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}メイヴは、彼女を圧倒した感情を抑制したように思われ、彼女は判決を待つ間あなたに臆病な視線を送る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive seems to have reined in the emotions that were overtaking her, and she casts a timid glance at you as she awaits the verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは、彼女を圧倒した感情を抑制したように思われ、彼女は判決を待つ間あなたに臆病な視線を送る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir repris le contrôle des émotions qui menaçaient de la submerger, Maive vous adresse un regard subreptice, guettant votre verdict.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive seems to have reined in the emotions that were overtaking her, and she casts a timid glance at you as she awaits the verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir repris le contrôle des émotions qui menaçaient de la submerger, Maive vous adresse un regard subreptice, guettant votre verdict.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive scheint die Gefühle, die zu überwältigen drohten, gezügelt zu haben. Sie blickt dich schüchtern an, während sie auf das Urteil wartet.{/n}
